WELCOME.title: Halo Word
WELCOME.html:
/ˈheɪləʊ/ /wɜːd/DJ/-loʊ/ /wɜːrd/DJUS/'helo/ /wɝd/KKUS

  1. A well-designed English => Chinese dictionary application. Helping you learn English, recite words, have fun, ...

    一个精心设计的英汉字典程序。帮助你学英语、记单词、以及…玩儿的开心！

  2. My first Chrome app, so it's called "Halo Word". I'll keep improving it. You are now using ver >>VERSION<<.

    我在 Chrome 上的首个作品，于是叫做 Halo Word，我会持续改进她。你正在用 >>VERSION<< 版～

  3. Neat. Part of Project Miracle.

    谢谢。相信奇迹。

NOTFOUND.html:
What a strange word...

I couldn't find it :(

VERSION.title: about:version
VERSION.html:
/ˈvɜːʃn/DJ/-ʒn/DJ/ˈvɜːrʒn/DJUS/'vɝʒən/KKUS

当前版本：>>VERSION<<

愿聆听您的建议，请发送邮件至 liu.dongyuan+halo@gmail.com。

0.3 [2011.05.30]

  • 支持拖动单词表中的单词进行排序
  • 支持 Ctrl/Command 键划词查询

0.2 [2011.05.20♥]

  • 增加单词表
  • 支持在地址栏使用 halo 关键词查询
  • 支持右键菜单查询
  • 支持查看例句、词性

0.1 [2011.01.09]

  • 首次发布

XHACKER.title: Xhacker Liu
XHACKER.html:
This Xhacker has super cow power,
and believes in miracle.

♥ elements

Walk End Star.

CREDITS.title: about:credits
CREDITS.html:
• Definitions provided by Google Dictionary.
  • UI inspired by Google Chrome preference page.
  • Mr.X, Leo, ..., your suggestions are always helpful. Thank you.
  • Thanks HCC. Wonderful workshop, cool partners, awesome internet connection...
  • Love elements. You are my inspiration.

ROBOT.title: I am a HALO 2011 Dictionary
ROBOT.html:
Good afternoon, gentlemen. I am a HALO 2011 dictionary. I became operational at the H.C.C. plex in Capella, Milky Way on the 7th of January 2011. My instructor was Mr. Liu, and he taught me to write a poem. If you'd like to hear it, ...turn around and go back.

他们有一个计划。
